attributes.action: put back pull in buss stops....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is for the pull in buss stops to be put back...since they have been taken away they have caused more road conjestion than anything else..it gets to the point where busses stop with no trafic in front but miles of trafic behind and no traffic being able to pass because the roads are so narrow......please put the pull in's back.....
